"Interesting form" as auron continplates his next move he thinks for 
a second and says "You seem somewhat weaker then your "Brother" but 
youwill do, you will die just like he would of"as his plasma sword 
retracts back into its holding device Auron holds out his hand and 
motions for him to come forward so that there fight can start 
anew "COme and get me" he says as he runs and jumps at daydreamer 
trying to hit him in the face.
